name: Cone of Cold
description: A blast of cold air erupts from your hands. Each creature in a 60-foot cone must make a constitution saving throw. A creature takes 8d8 cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.\nA creature killed by this spell becomes a frozen statue until it thaws.
higherLevels: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 5th.

components.cost: A small crystal or glass cone.

save.extra: A creature killed by this spell becomes a frozen statue until it thaws.
